title: Soooooooo Riot answer this plox
body:
Rioters, your probs reading this like, "Omfg, it's one of them troller questions"
Well it kinda is.
Who is the Rioter (OCE ONLY SO PISS OF PHREAK [no offence ily]) that responds most and or most friendly.

For me it's Maraudar, no offence to the other Rioters, Helpers, or the (uhh guys with the orange name tags) wrenchers. Cause I think s/he helps out most and s/he the first person I see respond.
ANYWAY MERRY XMAS AND HAPPY NEW YEAR!

TDLR: MARAUDAR (can't spell for shit) IS A NICE GUY / GIRL :D :D :D :D :D

replies.body: Maraudaur and Gehirn are the two I see most active on boards, and they're both the loveliest people, but there are of course other Rioters who tend to be more behind the scenes so special thanks to Zaps and Mindstar (and all the rest) too for always helping us out!

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AsgvQ76r,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-24T16:29:07.761+0000)
>
> Maraudaur and Gehirn are the two I see most active on boards, and they're both the loveliest people, but there are of course other Rioters who tend to be more behind the scenes so special thanks to Zaps and Mindstar (and all the rest) too for always helping us out!

Ty :D
Maraudaur is a guy and is probably the only Rioter I actually see that actually responds to Riot-directed posts, which is pretty sad for a company with the most active online users
